channel.title: Jekyll on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Küse's Codes

item.title: Hugo tips and tricks
item.description: This page describes my experiences with the static web site publishing tool Hugo. Open link in new tab There is a discussion which describes How to open links in a new tab.

item.title: Serving static pages locally
item.description: Running build-in tomcat server It is possible to deploy Jekyll sites locally, because OSX has a build-in Apache tomcat server. The local sites reside under ~/Sites.

item.title: Mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is a JavaScript based diagramming and charting tool that renders Markdown-inspired text definitions to create and modify diagrams dynamically.

item.title: General production optimization
item.description: Optimization General production structure capacited multi-level lot-sizing model PochetWolsey, page 45 $1 \le i \le m$: set of items to be produced $1 \le k \le K$: set of shared resources with limited capacity $1 \le t \le n$: time periods until final period n $p_t$: unit production cost $q_t$: fixed production cost $h_t$: unit inventory cost $d_t^i$: demand for item i to be satisified at period t $M_t$: large positive number, expressing an upper bound on the maximum lot size iin period t $L_t^k$: available capacity of resource k during period t $\alpha^{i k}, \beta^{i k}$: amount of capacity of resource k consumed $1 \le j \le m$: items $D(i)$ set of direct successors of part i in the BOM, i.

item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: This is a list of reminders and open questions I still wanted to look at in more detail. CSV conversion Next to FSharp.

item.title: Jekyll Tips & Tricks
item.description: This post covers some more Jekyll tips and tricks like searching a web page. Searching a Jekyll page Web pages based on databases such as WordPress search the data in the underlying database.

item.title: Math formulas and static web site generators
item.description: Mathematical formulas While working on post Mathe Uffzig, I stumbled upon the problem of displaying mathematical formulas in the Jekyll markdown templating engine Liquid.

item.title: Using Jekyll
item.description: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes.
